CustomField.description: This field is updated by HR. If the check box is checked, the information in the Position Description field will be posted on the Newmarket Corporate Website under Careers. The information will stay posted until this field is un-checked
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is updated by HR. If the check box is checked, the information in the Position Description field will be posted on the Newmarket Corporate Website under Careers. The information will stay posted until this field is un-checked
CustomField.label: Site.com Active
